import styles from './EditProfile.module.css' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {profile, resetMessage} from '../../slices/userSlice' import Message from '../../components/message/Message' const EditProfile = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {user, message, error, loading} = useSelector((state) => state.user) //states const [nome, setNome] = useState("") const [sobrenome, setSobrenome] = useState("") const [profileImage, setProfileImage] = useState("") const [tipoSangue, setTiposangue] = useState("") const [celular, setCelular] = useState("") const [local, setLocal] = useState("") const [senhaAtual, setSenhaAtual] = useState("") const [senhaNova, setSenhaNova] = useState("") const [confirmaSenha, setConfirmaSenha] = useState("") // load user data useEffect(() => { dispatch(profile()) }, [dispatch]) console.log(user) const [trocarSenha, setTrocarSenha] = useState(false) const tipos = [ "A+", "A-", "B+", "B-", "AB+", "AB-", "O+", "O-" ] const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("entrou") } const toggleTrocarSenha = () => { setTrocarSenha(!trocarSenha) } return (

) } export default EditProfile
